live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 07:48 PT.
62320.summary: Some customers in Esquimalt are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
62320.title: June 10 - Esquimalt | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
